## Epic: Starter Templates and Samples

**Priority:** P2 — User-facing content
**Scope:** Expand the template library and add a template browser UI
**Depends on:** None (independent)

### Issues
- [ ] 4.1 Game map templates — square grid and hex grid
- [ ] 4.2 Game inventory template
- [ ] 4.3 Social login buttons template
- [ ] 4.4 Payment cart template
- [ ] 4.5 Game UI template — mini-map, health bar, inventory
- [ ] 4.6 Template browser in the UI

### Exit Criteria
- Each template loads cleanly in the canvas
- Template browser accessible from File menu
